reqsimile.simcalc
Class FetchSimilar

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      reqsimile.simcalc.FetchSimilar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class FetchSimilar
extends java.lang.Thread

FetchSimilar is a thread that fetches all similar requirements to a specified requirements (e.g. a requirements selected in a table)

This thread is run every time a new list of requirements shall be fetched. Thus, for performance reasons this should be kept simple and fast.

The current solution depends on a certain way of preprocessing requirements. See the PreProcessRs class on how the preprocessing is made.

Since:
1.4.2
Author:
Johan Natt och Dag
See Also:
PreProcessRs
